sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
warps
ali
is warped
, se tisto poškoduje zaradi upogibanja ali krivljenja, pogosto zaradi vpliva vročine ali vode.

seg.quote: The cabinet doors began to warp soon after they were installed.
The wooden balconies were warped and weatherbeaten.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
warps someone's character
, na nekoga vpliva tako, da njegov značaj postane nenormalen ali slab.

seg.quote: ...a man whose whole character was warped by being bullied.

sense.def:
A warp in time or space
je namišljen prelom ali nenadna sprememba normalnega doživljanja časa ali prostora.

seg.quote: There's a kind of time warp in his education.
